title: Modular Mastery: How PrimeBlock Core Transformed Aitken College
author: Natalie
excerpt: At Urblo, we prove that foundational design need not be basic. For Aitken College’s dynamic new junior school, PrimeBlock Core – our simplest standardized product – became the hero. Through strategic layering, varied lengths, and seamless straight-curve combinations, these modular units created:
